title: Privacy Notice
description: This website tracks user interactions to improve your experience. No personal or sensitive data is collected or stored. Your theme and language preferences are saved locally on your device.

tracking.title: Interaction Tracking
tracking.description: We track how you interact with our website (pages visited, time spent) to improve functionality and user experience. This data is anonymous and does not identify you personally.

preferences.title: Local Storage
preferences.description: Your theme preference (light/dark mode) and language selection are stored locally on your device using browser storage. This data remains on your device and is not transmitted to our servers.
